name: education-toolkit
description: Comprehensive toolkit for course developers with 12 specialized agents, 10 slash commands, and automatic code review. Includes peer design review simulation, PAIRR (Peer and AI Review + Reflection), AI Roleplay exercises, diagnostic rubrics, accessibility auditing, widget testing, course QA, enhanced storyboard validation with interactivity analysis, and fullstack code review (FastAPI/Python + React/JSX) with PostToolUse hook for automatic quality checks after file edits. Bundled with 464 KB of frameworks and AI assessment research.
